ISSUE.TITLE: Update to 6.5.0 db schema fails on Oracle DB
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ``` org.flowable.common.engine.api.FlowableException: couldn't upgrade db schema: alter table ACT_RU_EVENT_SUBSCR add column SUB_SCOPE_ID_ NVARCHAR2(64) Caused by: oracle.jdbc.OracleDatabaseException: ORA-00904: : invalid identifier\n oracle.jdbc.driver.T4CTTIoer11.processError(T4CTTIoer11.java:513) ``` Looks like `add column X` should be `add X` in https://github.com/flowable/flowable-engine/blob/master/modules/flowable-eventsubscription-service/src/main/resources/org/flowable/eventsubscription/service/db/upgrade/flowable.oracle.upgradestep.6413.to.6500.eventsubscription.sql etc.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Add a property description at the beginning of flowable.http
